document.full_text: spain's ruling socialists suffered a crushing defeat in local elections on sunday, punished by voters after a week of protests over the eu's highest unemployment level and a stagnant economy.
document.title: spain's socialists punished in local elections
lines_and_colors: spain's ruling socialists suffered a crushing defeat in local elections on sunday, punished by voters after a week of protests over the eu's highest unemployment level and a stagnant economy.
